div.div: Changes in climate response for the June–August (JJA) season of all 33 sites (black dots) with its closest CRU grid point dataset (red dots) from the 1935–1964 to 1982–2011 period.
div.p: Differences in a) temperature and c) precipitation response were spatially interpolated. TRW sites with significant correlations for one of the periods are shown as a function of elevation for b) temperature (15 sites) and d) precipitation (22 sites) with the unfiltered and filtered (see legend and numbers in brackets) data.
